review: I recently purchased the 9V Battery Box Case Holder for my active guitar pickup, and I must say, it did not disappoint. The battery holder fit perfectly with my existing setup, and the installation was a breeze. The quality of the product is solid, and it feels durable. At $9.69, it's a great value for the money, especially considering how well it performs. The only minor drawback is that I haven't had the chance to test its long-term durability, but based on the initial impression and the positive reviews from other users, I'm confident it will last. Overall, a very satisfying purchase.
